definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
Eurasian land bridge (rail line linking China and Europe)
Eurasian hinterland (i.e. Central Asia including Xinjiang)
pinyin: Ya4 ou1 da4 lu4 fu4 di4

sentences.english: Only by being open and inclusive can a country prosper and can our continent prosper.
sentences.chinese: 只有开放兼容，国家才能富强，亚欧大陆才能兴旺。

sentences.english: Economic History, History of Science and Technology, Asian-European relations.
sentences.chinese: 经济史，科学技术史，亚欧关系。

sentences.english: Pass for the second Eurasian continental bridge an important railway crossings.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉山口为第二座亚欧大陆桥的重要铁路口岸。

sentences.english: Chinese Premier Li Peng attended the first Asia-Europe summit.
sentences.chinese: 李鹏总理出席了首届亚欧首脑会议。

sentences.english: This will give a great impetus to the ASEM process.
sentences.chinese: 这将是对亚欧会议进程的一大推进。

sentences.english: Xinjiang is situated in the northwest of China and in the center of Eurasian continents.
sentences.chinese: 新疆位于中国西北部，地处亚欧大陆中心。

sentences.english: Asia and Europe must deepen their financial cooperation in this sector.
sentences.chinese: 亚欧必须深化财金合作。

sentences.english: Over the past five years, ASEM has initiated extensive dialogues and cooperation of various forms.
sentences.chinese: 五年来，亚欧会议开展了广泛多样的对话与合作。

sentences.english: With marine compare with photograph of the first overbridge , bridge of new Asia-Europe mainland lacks competition ability.
sentences.chinese: 与海运和第一陆桥相比，新亚欧大陆桥缺乏竞争力。

sentences.english: It is a great pleasure to meet with you and other colleagues from ASEM members in Berlin.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴在柏林与亚欧会议成员的同事们相聚。

sentences.english: Did they travel across the Asia-Euro Land merely by camel caravans and on foot?
sentences.chinese: 他们真的只是靠驼队和双脚穿越的亚欧大陆吗？

sentences.english: We warmly welcome the convening of Asia-Europe meeting in London.
sentences.chinese: 我们热烈欢迎亚欧会议在伦敦召开。

sentences.english: Strong earthquakes successively occurred on the eastern and western parts of the Eurasian belt.
sentences.chinese: 亚欧带东段和西段继续发生强震。

sentences.english: Eurasian countries have strong economic complementarities and enjoy promising prospects of cooperation between industries and businesses.
sentences.chinese: 亚欧国家经济互补性强，产业和企业合作前景广阔。

sentences.english: The cooperation between Chinese and Asian-European has moved on to the new level.
sentences.chinese: 中国与亚欧各国的互利合作正在步入一个全新的阶段。

sentences.english: The Eurasian seismic belt still remained in quiescence.

definition: the Silk Road/abbr. for 絲綢之路|丝绸之路[Si1 chou2 zhi1 Lu4]
Eurasian land bridge (rail line linking China and Europe)
